alert.note: Alert for Fall River; Southern Foot Hills (South Dakota) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.senderName: NWS RapidCity (Western South Dakota and Northeastern Wyoming)
info.headline: Special Weather Statement issued July 31 at 9:08PM MDT by NWS RapidCity
info.description: ...A strong thunderstorm will impact portions of western Fall River County through 1000 PM MDT... At 907 PM MDT, Doppler radar was tracking a strong thunderstorm 10 miles southwest of Provo, or 15 miles southwest of Edgemont, moving east at 30 mph. HAZARD...Wind gusts up to 50 mph and penny size hail. SOURCE...Radar indicated. IMPACT...Gusty winds could knock down tree limbs and blow around unsecured objects. Minor damage to outdoor objects is possible. This strong thunderstorm will be near... Provo around 915 PM MDT. Rumford around 925 PM MDT. MAX HAIL SIZE...0.75 IN MAX WIND GUST...50 MPH
info.instruction: If outdoors, consider seeking shelter inside a building.
